description: Submission of a noise assessment report in pursuant to condition 12 of planning application Ref: 224872FUL dated 09/03/2023 for 'Single storey rear extension and installation of ramp and raised steps (following part demolition of rear addition, side addition and canopy); alteration to external elevations involving installation of two windows to ground floor side elevation; installation of one rooflight to front roofslope; installation of two rooflights to side roof slope; single storey outbuilding for ancillary use to 12 bedroom assisted living accommodation; associated car/cycle parking, refuse storage; installation of secured gate access to side of property'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
